sentences.sentence: He added there was clear culpability on the part of the government.
sentences.translation: 他补充说政府方面明显负有责任。

sentences.sentence: Moral culpability would plague him to the end.
sentences.translation: 道德上的罪恶感将困扰他的余生。

sentences.sentence: "The members who voted no will have some culpability," he said.
sentences.translation: “投反对票的议员要承担一些罪责，”他说。
